author: Kelly Crowe
title: Will it really take 'weeks' to ease physical distancing? Maybe not
description: WIth increasing evidence that Canada has succeeded in flattening the COVID-19 curve, the next challenge is when and how to begin easing Canada's physical distancing rules. Take it slow and steady, some experts suggest, adding that it might be possible to star…
content:
How much longer?
That's the visceral plea from Canadians who have been stuck at home for more than a month, many trapped in private purgatory.
Some are stranded
 with abusive family members
, others are watching their family businesses deteriorate. There … [+8417 chars]
